mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ztraining_task_content WHERE ztrainingtaskID=#{ztrainingtaskID} AND zorder=#{zorder};
SELECT MAX(zorder) as zorder FROM ztraining_task_content WHERE ztrainingtaskID=#{ztrainingtaskID}

SELECT B.* FROM ztask_content_log A, ztraining_task_content B, zassign_schedule C, zstudent_schedule D,(SELECT zstudentID,zrecognizetime FROM zstudent_login WHERE zrecognizeIP=(SELECT zstudentPCIP FROM ztraining_facility WHERE zid=#{facilityID}))E WHERE (TIME_TO_SEC(NOW())- TIME_TO_SEC(A.zstarttime)<3600) AND (A.zendtime>A.zstarttime) AND A. ztrainingtaskcontentID=B.zid AND zassignscheduleID=C.zid AND A. zassignscheduleID=C.zid AND C.ztrainingtaskID=B. ztrainingtaskID AND C. zstudentscheduleID=D.zid AND D.zstudentID=E.zstudentID and DATE(A.zstarttime) = CURDATE() and E.zrecognizetime < A.zendtime ORDER BY A.zstarttime DESC
